long_description: The women's roomy Osprey Sirrus 36 Pack offers a customized fit and impressive ventilation for all-day comfort on long hikes and snowshoe treks. Women-specific harness and hipbelt provide a dialed-in fit. Stretch-mesh back panel allows warm, moist air to escape. Top- and panel-loading main compartment provides easy access to your gear. Top lid has 2 zippered pockets and dual vertical compression straps. Hydration-compatible design accommodates a reservoir (sold separately) for on-the-go drinking. 2 side mesh pockets and zippered hipbelt pockets; side compression straps can be routed over or under the side mesh pockets. Stow-on-the-Go(TM) system lets you attach trekking poles or an ice axe. Integrated raincover helps keep contents dry and stashes in its own pocket. The women's Osprey Sirrus 36 Pack is made of durable nylon in eye-pleasing colors and graphics.
short_description: The women's roomy Osprey Sirrus 36 Pack offers a customized fit and impressive ventilation for all-day comfort on long hikes and snowshoe treks.
